Sentencas: Extrusion is one of the most effective and inexpensive methods used in the production of ceramic tubes for tubular or micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) applications.
Titulo: Investigation of micro-tube solid oxide fuel cell fabrication using extrusion method

Sentencas: In this method, the parameters such as the viscosity of the ceramic slurry, the extrusion speed and the die temperature need to be optimized for a high performance.
Titulo: Investigation of micro-tube solid oxide fuel cell fabrication using extrusion method

Sentencas: In this study, anode supported micro-tubular solid oxide fuel cells are successfully fabricated via a specially designed vertical-type piston extruder machine.
Titulo: Investigation of micro-tube solid oxide fuel cell fabrication using extrusion method

Sentencas: The die design enables the production of micro-tubular SOFCs with outer diameters from 3 to 4.5 mm.
Titulo: Investigation of micro-tube solid oxide fuel cell fabrication using extrusion method

Sentencas: The die temperature is determined to be the most important process parameter and the suitable die temperature is ranging 40-70 degrees C depending on the slurry content.
Titulo: Investigation of micro-tube solid oxide fuel cell fabrication using extrusion method

Sentencas: The electrolyte layer is coated on the anode support tube by vacuum assist dip coating technique and co-sintering is applied with a home-made porous sintering apparatus to avoid dimensional anomalies.
Titulo: Investigation of micro-tube solid oxide fuel cell fabrication using extrusion method

Sentencas: The effects of the parameters such as the composition of the electrolyte solution, the vacuum pressure and the immersion time on the electrolyte thickness are investigated.
Titulo: Investigation of micro-tube solid oxide fuel cell fabrication using extrusion method

Sentencas: It is found that the electrolyte thickness decreases when the immersion time and vacuum pressure are reduced.
Titulo: Investigation of micro-tube solid oxide fuel cell fabrication using extrusion method

Sentencas: Moreover, the thickness of the electrolyte is found to be depended on the content of the electrolyte solution.
Titulo: Investigation of micro-tube solid oxide fuel cell fabrication using extrusion method

Sentencas: The effect of the pre-sintering temperature on the electrolyte quality is also investigated.
Titulo: Investigation of micro-tube solid oxide fuel cell fabrication using extrusion method

Sentencas: The sintering temperatures of 1000 degrees C and 1100 degrees C provide a similar and desired electrolyte microstructure.
Titulo: Investigation of micro-tube solid oxide fuel cell fabrication using extrusion method

Sentencas: A peak power density of 140 mW cm(-2) is obtained at 700 degrees C from the final cell.
Titulo: Investigation of micro-tube solid oxide fuel cell fabrication using extrusion method
